```{r xaringan-themer, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
set.seed(78987)
library(xaringanthemer)
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)

style_duo_accent(
  primary_color = mskRvis::msk_palettes$contrast[1], 
  secondary_color = mskRvis::msk_palettes$contrast[2],
  header_font_google = google_font("Josefin Sans"),
  text_font_google   = google_font("Montserrat", "300", "300i"),
  code_font_google   = google_font("Fira Mono")
)
```
